description:
Ryuune disliked the design of the Valsion, which caused her father, Dr. Bian Zoldark, to create the Valsione for her.
It was made in the shape of a girl in order to appeal to her. It was created with artificial muscles, allowing it to have various facial expressions.
It`s equipped with a system that is similar to the DML System, which allows Ryuune to control its movements with her own.
name: DCSMH-02 Valsione
